java/liquibase/database/sql/RenameTableStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.*;
00004 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00005 
00006 public class RenameTableStatement implements SqlStatement {
00007     private String schemaName;
00008     private String oldTableName;
00009     private String newTableName;
00010 
00011     public RenameTableStatement(String schemaName, String oldTableName, String newTableName) {
00012         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00013         this.oldTableName = oldTableName;
00014         this.newTableName = newTableName;
00015     }
00016 
00017     public String getSchemaName() {
00018         return schemaName;
00019     }
00020 
00021     public String getOldTableName() {
00022         return oldTableName;
00023     }
00024 
00025     public String getNewTableName() {
00026         return newTableName;
00027     }
00028 
00029     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00030         if (!supportsDatabase(database)) {
00031             throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException(this, database);
00032         }
00033 
00034         if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00035             return "exec sp_rename '" + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), oldTableName) + "', " + database.escapeTableName(null, newTableName);
00036         } else if (database instanceof MySQLDatabase) {
00037             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), oldTableName) + " RENAME " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getNewTableName());
00038         } else if (database instanceof PostgresDatabase) {
00039             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), oldTableName) + " RENAME TO " + database.escapeTableName(null, newTableName);
00040         } else if ((database instanceof DerbyDatabase) || ((database instanceof MaxDBDatabase))) {
00041             return "RENAME TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), oldTableName) + " TO " + database.escapeTableName(null, newTableName);
00042         } else if (database instanceof HsqlDatabase) {
00043             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), oldTableName) + " RENAME TO " + database.escapeTableName(null, newTableName);
00044         } else if (database instanceof OracleDatabase) {
00045             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), oldTableName) + " RENAME TO " + database.escapeTableName(null, newTableName);
00046         } else if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00047             return "RENAME " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), oldTableName) + " TO " + database.escapeTableName(null, newTableName);//db2 doesn't allow specifying new schema name
00048         } else if (database instanceof SQLiteDatabase) {
00049             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), oldTableName) + " RENAME TO " + database.escapeTableName(null, newTableName);
00050         }
00051 
00052         return "RENAME " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getOldTableName()) + " TO " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getNewTableName());
00053     }
00054 
00055     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00056         return ";";
00057     }
00058 
00059     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00060         return !(database instanceof CacheDatabase || database instanceof FirebirdDatabase);
00061     }
00062 }
